info.title: SmithTech API with Insights
info.description: API endpoints for SmithTech with insights and operation IDs.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the system names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a SystemID is needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/systems' is designed for This endpoint is a reference table containing the system names and ID for the hospital systems.

get.description: Example Use returns SystemID,SystemName for SystemID = 1,
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/systems/1' is designed for Example Use returns SystemID,SystemName for SystemID = 1,.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the location names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a LocationID is needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/locations' is designed for This endpoint is a reference table containing the location names and ID for the hospital systems.

get.description: Example Use returns LocationID,LocationName for SystemID = 1,
get.insight: Endpoint '/api/locations/2' is designed for Example Use returns LocationID,LocationName for SystemID = 1,.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance plan names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a PlanID needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurances' is designed for This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance plan names and ID for the hospital systems.

get.description: Example used to get InsurancePlan information for PlanID = 1
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurances/1' is designed for Example used to get InsurancePlan information for PlanID = 1.

get.description: This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance type names and ID for the hospital systems. It should be use whenever a InsuranceTypeID needed to be passed into another route
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-types' is designed for This endpoint is a reference table containing the insurance type names and ID for the hospital systems.

get.description: Example used to get InsuranceTypeID, InsuranceType for InsuranceTypeID =3
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-types/3' is designed for Example used to get InsuranceTypeID, InsuranceType for InsuranceTypeID =3.

get.description: Example used to get plans for given CarrierID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/insurance-plans/4' is designed for Example used to get plans for given CarrierID.

get.description: Example gets in network for SystemID = 4
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/records/system/3' is designed for Example gets in network for SystemID = 4.

get.description: Example gets in network insurnace plans for SystemID = 4 and Location  = 17
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/records/system/4/location/17' is designed for Example gets in network insurnace plans for SystemID = 4 and Location  = 17.

get.description: Example Use get the LocationID and SystemID for given PlanID
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/eligibility/network-info/1' is designed for Example Use get the LocationID and SystemID for given PlanID.

get.description: Returns all the table in the database
get.insight: Endpoint '/db_admin/tables' is designed for Returns all the table in the database.

get.description: Example returns list of rows where ServiceDescription is = 99212
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/charges/billingcode/99212' is designed for Example returns list of rows where ServiceDescription is = 99212.

get.description: Example returns list of rows where BillingCode is like '%lung%'
get.insight: Endpoint '/react/charges/description/lung' is designed for Example returns list of rows where BillingCode is like '%lung%'.
